word: We must not limit our school advantages in teachers or in school facilities, if we would make the work a success. Our mission school must stand upon God-given principles, that students may receive on all-round education. We want young men and women to go forth from the Avondale school as medical missionaries, as laborers together with God.--Letter 52, 1898, p. 4. (To A. G. Daniells, typed June 13, 1898.)
